title: #185 Furnished ONLY Spacious 1 bedroom w/ parking
posting_body: Quiet and private 1-BR, furnished pied a terre only steps away from Hyde and Polk Street restaurants and retail, picturesque Lombard Street, and Swenson's original ice cream parlor.
Two Muni/bus stops (45 and 41) just outside the door plus the Hyde Street cable car make city travel a breeze.

On the ground floor of a three-floor/three-unit building that includes a shared roof deck with views of the Golden Gate Bridge, the apartment features bamboo floors, contemporary furnishings, and artwork that reflect the tastes of its architect-owner.
A modern kitchen with granite counters and stainless steel appliances also includes a side-by-side washer and dryer.
With a pull-out couch, sleeps four.
Available FULLY FURNISHED and EQUIPPED ONLY, Please no inquiries for unfurnished.
o	Water, garbage, PGE cap up to $50 a month
